text: Mesomorph rules: 1) Keep steady protein each meal (egg/fish/chicken/dhal). Use moderate carbs (rice/roti/string hoppers) and plenty of vegetables. If goal is fat loss, reduce rice portion; if goal is muscle gain, add one extra protein item or snack.
